CustomField.formula:
(Paid_Amount__c-( PO_Total__c * IF(ISBLANK(Completion__c),0,Completion__c )))/ (PO_Total__c * IF(ISBLANK(Completion__c),0,Completion__c ) )
/*(buildertek__Paid_Amount__c-( buildertek__PO_Total__c * buildertek__Completion__c ))/ (buildertek__PO_Total__c * buildertek__Completion__c )*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount Over/Under Paid based on Completion % and Amount Paid.
CustomField.label: Over/Under(-) Paid
